front.title: DHCPv4 option for PANA Authentication Agents

abstract.t: This document defines a new Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol version 4 (DHCPv4) option that contains a list of domain names or IPv4 addresses that can be mapped to one or more of PANA Authentication Agents (PAA). This is one of the many methods that a PANA Client (PaC) can use to locate PANA Authentication Agents (PAA).
